Articles.Content: Yeah, I've noticed the textures seem a little plain. Not a complaint really, I don't notice the textures too much when theres a missile charging up my tail pipe, but maybe up the textures once all the models are released and working?

> 
> Yeah, I've noticed the textures seem a little plain. Not a complaint really, I don't notice the textures too much when theres a missile charging up my tail pipe, but maybe up the textures once all the models are released and working?

As I mentioned Russian missiles are a bit dull so I'm going to get creative with them once I get the remaining models in game the 9M120 Ataka will stay the same since it looks much better though. That and I won't add too much to the R-77 since I already added the blue just cause 

The American ones I think are better specifically the AIM-54 ground launched Harpoon and RIM-116

Also welcome to the Fourms
Do you have any plans for weapons after you are done with the ones your are currently working on?

> 
> Do you have any plans for weapons after you are done with the ones your are currently working on?

Once the first package is complete I will be adding weapons by popular demand and throwing In others on occasion but I have no set plans at the moment. I don't want to oversaturate at the weapons catalog. My next project is actually going to be armor panels and perhaps some land based missile countermeasures for tanks to complemet PrototypeTheta's Never Enuff Dakka

Nice! And hey, when it comes to detailing, extraneous ........ lines of unreadable text always look good. And ground based countermeasures would be awesome. I recently asked Baha about some kind of constant passive jammer, but we'll see.

Alright guys sorry about the two week hiatus I had personal business to take care of and honestly needed a break after two weeks of nothing but modding. I intend to finalize the release pack in the next few days and begin on the armor panels. On that end I'm going to keep it simple with some dedicated armor parts based off of the stock structural panels with new textures but I also intend to add some triangular plates and some .5m by 1m armor designed to look like ERA bricks. However it will NOT function as ERA since I have no idea how in the world I would get that to work. Any other parts will be made on user request. I will also start a dedicated thread to my maintenance of Spanner's Boomsticks.

I'm going to make an official request for an AGM-88 HARM, ALARM, or other anti-radiation missiles. If you chopped the booster off the RIM-174, you'd pretty much have the AGM-78, so anyhow, Wild Weasels away!
